column4: Alright I've been having problems with hardware on my Ubuntu System for like the past couple of days can you people help me or not?
Alright, well, first it isn't detecting my camera, so I'm giving up on it
Then, it didn't detect my new CD Burner
and I gave up on that
and I don't see anything in the menus about hardware
so, question: How do I get my printer to work?
under Menu->Accessories->Printer Manager it says the state of the printer is "Stopped"
What is your printer? Are you using which version of ubuntu?
are you using ubuntu, kubuntu or xubuntu?
oh, this is the one I dont have here :( Try to find an "Add printer" dialog
then right click printer and choose "start"
I resumed the printer and tried to print but the printer said no
